title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. IX, pt. 2392 - Reasonable Cause
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. IX, pt. 2392 - Reasonable Cause

State Regulations
§ 2392.1 - Reasonable cause

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. IX, pt. 2392

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §§ 171, 697[a]; arts. 9, 9-A, 12-A, 13, 13-A, 18, 20, 21, 21-A, 22, 26, 26-A, 27, 28, 28-A, 29, 30, 30-A, 30-B, 31, 32, 33, 33-A
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
